page.title: 08RECREATION - COUNTRY PARK
page.content: IN OUR AREA WE HAVE A LOVELY COUNTRY PARK CALLED 'CUERDEN VALLEY PARK' WHICH WAS OPENED IN 1980 AS AN AMENITY FOR THE AREA. COUNTRY PARKS ARE LAND SPECIALLY SET ASIDE WHERE YOU CAN ENJOY THE COUNTRYSIDE. FARMERS STILL OWN THE LAND AND YOU HAVE TO BE CAREFUL TO REMEMBER THE COUNTRY CODE AND NOT TO TRESPASS ON THE FARMER'S FIELDS. YOU CAN ENJOY THE FARM ANIMALS, WALK IN THE WOODS AND EVEN FISH IN THE LAKE. WE HAVE A WIDE VARIETY OF SCENERY AND IT IS LOVELY TO TAKE AN EVENING WALK IN THE SUMMER. IN WINTER IT IS JUST AS BEAUTIFUL BUT IN AN OBVIOUSLY DIFFERENT WAY. THE LOCAL CHILDREN LOVE TO TAKE THEIR SLEDGES TO THE SLOPES AND HILLS AND SLIDE DOWN IN THE SNOW VERY QUICKLY, USUALLY SHRIEKING WITH LAUGHTER AS THEY FALL INTO A PILE OF SNOW.
